name: Piranha Plant, short stem
desc: A short classic-style Piranha Plant. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Piranha Plant, short stem upside-down
desc: A short upside-down classic-style Piranha Plant. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Sideways Piranha Plant short stem (left)
desc: A short classic-style piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the left. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Sideways Piranha Plant short stem (right)
desc: A short classic-style piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the right. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Piranha Plant, red short stem
desc: A short classc-style Piranha Plant. It ignores Mario's proximity.

name: Piranha Plant, red short stem upside-down
desc: A short upside-down classic-style Piranha Plant. It ignores Mario's proximity.

name: Sideways Piranha Plant red short stem (left)
desc: A short classic-style piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the left. It ignores Mario's proximity.

name: Sideways Piranha Plant red short stem (right)
desc: A short classic-style piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the right. It ignores Mario's proximity.

name: Venus Piranha Plant short stem
desc: A short Venus Piranha Plant that shoots one fireball at Mario. It stays hidden if he is near it.

name: Venus Piranha Plant, short stem upside-down
desc: A short upside-down Venus Piranha Plant that shoots one fireball at Mario. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Sideways Venus Piranha Plant shot stem (left)
desc: A short venus Piranha Plant that comes out of pipes from the left and shoots one fireball at Mario. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Sideways Venus Piranha Plant short stem (right)
desc: A short venus piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the right and shoots one fireball at Mario. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Venus Piranha Plant, short stem shoot two
desc: A short Venus Piranha Plant that shoots two fireballs at Mario. It stays hidden if he is near it.

desc: A short upside-down Venus Piranha Plant that shoots two fireballs at Mario. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Sideways Venus Piranha Plant short stem shoot two (left)
desc: A short venus Piranha Plant that comes out of pipes from the left and shoots two fireballs at Mario. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.

name: Sideways Venus Piranha Plant short stem shoot two (right)
desc: A short venus piranha plant that comes out of pipes from the right and shoots two fireballs at Mario. It stays hidden if Mario is near it.
